mapper.insert: insert into tracks (libelle, description, color, event_id) values (#{libelle}, #{description}, #{color}, #{event})
mapper.select: SELECT t.libelle as name, COUNT(p.id) as count FROM tracks t LEFT OUTER JOIN proposals p on t.id = p.track WHERE t.event_id = #{eventId} GROUP BY t.libelle
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tracks WHERE id = #{id} and event_id = #{eventId}
